summary: Rogue intelligence agents, right-wing politicians, greedy capitalists, and free-lance assassins plot and carry out the JFK assassination in this speculative agitprop.
cast: Burt Lancaster|Robert Ryan|Will Geer|Gilbert Green|John Anderson|Paul Carr|Colby Chester|Ed Lauter|Walter Brooke|John Brascia|Richard Bull|Sidney Clute|Deanna Darrin|Lee Delano|Lloyd Gough|Graydon Gould|Rick Hurst|Robert Karnes|James MacColl|Joaquín Martínez|Dick Miller|Oscar Oncidi|Tom Peters|Paul Sorensen|Hunter von Leer|Sandy Ward|William Watson|Matthew Ahman|George Aiken|Rutanya Alda|Glen A. title: Acción ejecutiva
